alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 10:57AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Grady, southeastern Oklahoma, northwestern Cleveland, southeastern Canadian and northwestern McClain Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1057 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chickasha to near Middleberg. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Oklahoma City, northwestern Norman, Moore, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Choctaw, Tuttle, Valley Brook, Amber, Bridge Creek, Norge, Stanley Draper Lake, Middleberg, Tabler, Tinker Air Force Base and Ninnekah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 108 and 122. Interstate 40 between mile markers 162 and 168. Interstate 44 between mile markers 73 and 114. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
